overview: Justine Tanya Bateman (born February 19, 1966) is an American actress, writer and producer. Her television career included a regular role on the sitcom Family Ties from 1982 until 1989. She currently runs a consulting company, SECTION 5 and a production company, FM78.tv, of which she is a founding partner.
